metadata.title: NAPEARL Soft Satin Swag Valance Curtains, Waterfall Valance with Tassles for Bedroom Living Room, 1 Piece Teal Window Valance, 61 x 49 Inch
features: 【Package Contains】Each package contains 1 teal swag curtain. Each curtain valance measures 61 inches wide by 49 inches long, and with 3 inches rod pocket on top, fits most standard rods, easy to install

【Elegant & Soft】This window valance is both relaxed and refined. It creates a smooth draping effect, soft texture, and easy maintenance. Little tassles are sewn at the bottom of the curtain, and satin folds are layered

【Home decoration】Outfit your windows with a touch of texture with this curtain valance, a charming design that adds dimension to your space. It also can soften up the look of the window and appears a luxury and airy look

【Widely Used】Our swag valance curtains can beautifully cover your upper portion of windows, control and balance sunlight come into your room. And add more height to the windows. They will be the perfect finishing touch in your living room, bedroom, cafe, dining room and other place

【Warm Tips】1.These valance curtains are machine washable in cold water ( lower than 86℉ ). delicate cycle with mild detergent, tumble dry. Don't bleach 2.A little steam will get all of the shipping wrinkles out and have them looking great 3.If you have any questions, please contact us. We will help you solve the problem within 24 hours
description: Sold in 1 Package of 1 Waterfall Valance 3" Rod Pocket, Width 61"(155cm), Length 49"(125cm) Made of 100% Polyester Thin Sheer Fabrics Easy to Care, Machine Washable, Iron With Low Heat Easy to Hang, Make Your Home Luxury and Elegant
